snippet: The Buffalo Bills and New England Patriots started their hostilities about 45 minutes before Sunday's kickoff when a melee broke out between the two teams on the New England sideline....
lead_paragraph: The Buffalo Bills and New England Patriots started their hostilities about 45 minutes before Sunday's kickoff when a melee broke out between the two teams on the New England sideline.

headline.main: Never Mind Waiting for Game, Bills and Patriots Fight Before
headline.print_headline: Never Mind Waiting for Game, Bills and Patriots Fight Before
